summary: Export a machine learning model to a workspace
description:
Exports a machine learning model to a specified workspace location. This is designed for intermediate model storage and can use the implementation's native serialization format.

Unlike save_ml_model, this process doesn't require STAC compliance or specific model formats (like ONNX), making it suitable for temporary storage and transfer of models between processes.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: The machine learning model to be exported. This can be in any format supported by the implementation.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name to be given to the exported model. This will be used to identify the model when importing it later.

parameters.name: folder
parameters.description: The folder path within the workspace where the model should be stored.

returns.description: A boolean indicating whether the export was successful.
